website_summaries.verdict: This 30-pack of plastic champagne flutes brings some shimmer and shine to any event, all while delivering a durable and functional product at a bargain price.
pros: Easy to assemble and made of sturdy plastic
Durable enough to be washed and reused
Glasses have subtle glitter shimmer to them, making them an attractive choice for a special event
cons: These require assembly as well as hand washing

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly how I thought they would be! Purchased them for my sister in laws bridal shower and they were great! Easy to assemble and not a super cheap plastic! I was actually presently surprised with how well they were packaged and how thick the plastic was! We saved them and will be using them for our New Year's Eve party as well! Overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All that glitters is gold!
customer_reviews.text: I love these champagne flutes. I'm officially throwing away my spray paint and only buying these already glitter flutes. A life saver and a time savor. Packed with care to prevent damage. I'm a forever customer!
customer_reviews.author: Veldatheresa

customer_reviews.title: None arrived broken! Very elegant
customer_reviews.text: Based on previous reviews, I was worried that the quality of these glasses was lacking due to broken product. However, I was very pleased when they arrived. I was home when they were delivered, and the man clearly just dropped the package to the ground. I was so worried that his lack of care would have caused these to break. However, all 60 glasses were in perfect condition. The packaging was great; each row was lined with thin foam for protection. The subtle glitter on the gold set is a nice touch. Even my husband likes them (and he usually hates glitter). These are perfect for anyone seeking disposable but elegant champagne flutes.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Pretty flutes.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic glasses I bought these for an Oscars party...they are perfect. Have a pretty subtle sparkle gold glitter embedded in the flute. Have to screw on bottom but they are sturdy and stay together. Have to say this was the best and quickest package I ever got from Amazon. Attached photo of how well they are packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Hopeful

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but expect some broken ones
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute. The light glitter look is great and definitely not too tacky like I was worried about. HOWEVER since opening just the first pack one of them already has a deep crack which makes me wonder how many more I'll find like that. So beware when buying and don't expect the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: P. fong

customer_reviews.title: Most of the plastic glasses i received were broke,
customer_reviews.text: Most of the plastic glasses i received were broke, and i wasnt even able to use them for the event
customer_reviews.author: Whitney D

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Tall, clear plastic with beautiful gold glitter. Used these at my mom's shower. They were just right.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations ! So beautiful and thick I really love it and will impress my family for thanksgiving
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Disconnected bottoms
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms of these glasses were a pain to put on and they kept falling off. My guests were looking all over the floor for the bottom of their flute. So they stood there holding champagne that they no longer wanted because they couldn't stand the glass up without the bottom. Many of the bottoms cracked while were trying to put them on. It took us about 30 minutes that we didn't have to put all the bottoms on before our NYE party.
customer_reviews.author: ROB W.

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY liked this. They worked very well at my NYE party. They are durable and I love the gold sparkle on them. A few did get cracked (split) but that’s probably because I had a few savages at the party. I think the flutes will be fine with a more civilized group. Lol 😂
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These came packaged very nicely. No brokens in my pack, looked great and added a nice touch to the mimosa bar at a bridal shower. Easy to put together as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Get Some Glue Ready...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Elegant & good looking design. Just about right size and volume. Lightweight . Cons: Comes as 2 pieces that require "assembly" (which is normal). However the pieces (stem & base) separate way too easily. If you hold the piece by the flute or stem, there is a good chance that the base will fall off under its own tiny weight. Bottom line: Be prepared to tell all users about this deficiency, and/or... Get some crazy glue and start gluing those pieces permanently.
customer_reviews.author: ogryzek

customer_reviews.title: Great flutes for mimosas!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with these plastic flutes. They were packaged in sealed groups of six and placed in a padded box which fit them perfectly. The gold specks were nicely throughout each flute, bases were sturdy and did not come off, and there were no rough edges around the tops. No flaws or broken items. We used them for mimosas at a bridal shower and everyone commented on how pretty they were. I washed them and plan to use them a couple more times for other upcoming events. I do not think you would be disappointed in these nice flutes.
customer_reviews.author: Bower Family

customer_reviews.title: Great price for large quantity of plastic glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great price for large quantity of plastic glasses... but gold glitter, although seemed like a good idea, actually just makes these look dirty or dusty from a distance. Close up, you can see it small gold specs, but not so nice just sitting on the counter. They did serve their purpose though... no broken glass on New Year's Eve.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY !
customer_reviews.text: The gold glitter cups are so pretty. Perfect for my NYE party. The bottom stand is separate from he cup and has to be put together. It was easy to do and the cup was steady.
customer_reviews.author: RYLL

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly but Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were better quality and were just one piece instead of 2 pieces. The bottom hold of the glass had to be plugged into the glass stem and they kept falling off. I wish I could return them. Wont buy again. Would prefer buying the ones that are one piece and does not need fiddling around.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my cousin's 21st birthday party and they were great! They came packaged very securely, which I appreciated and I liked that I could put the glasses back in the box for storage. The glitter is very cute and gives the glasses a special touch. The size is great too, you can see my photo for a reference of the size compared to the height of a champagne bottle. Overall really good!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Lakhian

customer_reviews.title: POPPING for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: These flutes will work perfectly for my upcoming wedding! I really like how you can see the glitter on the flute without liquid in it, but the glitter sure does POP even better once liquid is filled inside the flute. Which will be great for wedding pictures!! The order came in a secure package so no flutes were broken. I look forward to using these at my wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Daja

customer_reviews.title: Great durable glassware for an elegant party
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these glasses for a mimosas bar themed shower. They were easy to put together and nice and sturdy. There were no issues with the glasses tipping over or spilling. We even ran them through the dishwasher after the party just to see how they would hold up and they looked like new. The finish is great with just the right amount of sparkle of gold. I would highly recommend these for any party.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Anderson

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty to look at but as far as ready to ...
customer_reviews.text: These were just okay! They are pretty to look at but as far as ready to use right out of the package they are not. First of all the flutes themselves were full of dust so we had to wash each one not a big deal because i would have rinsed them out anyways. Secondly, the bottoms did not fit on the flutes. Usually with plastic flutes, they snap in and are secure, these however did not fit. We had to hot glue each bottom to the flute. Again not a huge deal but just a little disappointed with the product. They were cute and went well with our theme.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is great, not one broke
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect!! Not a single one was broken. The packaging was great! At first glance they looked a little cloudy, I thought they were dirty. After looking a little longer I realized it was just the gold glitter. It was perfect for a toast at a family party. I managed to save some for future use. The bottoms did fall off of most of them at some point but they worked fine
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well packaged
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in perfect condition. I checked each one! The bottoms fit snugly and they have a beautiful shimmer. Exactly what I expected. I think the plastic is lightweight so if you’re having an outdoor event, they’ll likely blow over if not full of liquid. That’s pretty much what you get with plastic. I think the time you’re most likely to crack them is unwrapping from shipping shrink wrap. Don’t squeeze too tightly. I didn’t break any but felt I could have if I wasn’t careful.
customer_reviews.author: USA customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute for parties!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. So many use for them. I used some of them for a bachelorette party and some for a Christmas party. Better than just a plain champagne glass. And it’s plastic so no need to worry about people breaking them.
customer_reviews.author: Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These flutes surpassed my expectations! They were very sturdy and well made! We used them for the kiddos during thanksgiving for apple cider and they loved that they could join in with the adults! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Had these for my gold themed New Years Eve Party. Wish I could have gotten less than thirty but I guess we’ll just have to use them next year too! None were broken and they were one piece, no flimsy two piece like some I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Broken glasses.
customer_reviews.text: 5 glasses were cracked and could not be used, which was unfortunate because it looks like they put effort into the packaging, but it just didn't hold up. The non cracked glasses were decent quality, not worth the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: They are very pretty and you get a lot for a good price. I glued my bottoms so they stay on easier. Came in very nice packaging where you can wash em and store em back if you’d like.
customer_reviews.author: francine barone

customer_reviews.title: Love these plastic champagne glasses!
customer_reviews.text: We used these for my sister's bridal shower and now I'm back to buy some more for my own shower! We loved these cute glasses. They are packaged well, not one was broken upon arrival. They are easy to put together and so very practical and cute for parties! Can't wait to have them for my own!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Sturgell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: These cups are sooo perfect! They’re sturdy, sparkley, pretty, and high quality. I bought some for a bachelorette party and liked them so much that I’m going to order another box for the bridal shower too. They add such a great touch to the special event. They were also packaged the most efficient/secure that I have ever seen anything packaged; their presentation exceeded all expectations. All in all these cups are a must buy:)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Half of them came damaged and broken. I should've snapped a picture. Otherwise, they're just cheap plastic "glasses"... decent for small house parties. I wouldn't buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbi

customer_reviews.title: Toast away to elegance
customer_reviews.text: I found these online and decided to return the ones I bought from Walmart. The were stylish a bit of glitter on cup added a cuteness. They served its purpose and I love how they came packaged in a box. Worth every penny and I love these items.
customer_reviews.author: LabLover

customer_reviews.title: Um, no.
customer_reviews.text: Yes: very inexpensive. Yes: arrived on time and unbroken. No: not sturdy; they teeter or fall apart. No: glasses do not look as good in real life as any of the photos. Verdict: these are okay for a "novelty" champagne toast, like someone got promoted and you need 25 one-time glasses for 60 seconds amongst the cubicles. For any higher purpose, keep clicking.
customer_reviews.author: KFL

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: These were very pretty and easy to assemble. They came packaged really nicely as well. They look great with champagne in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super cute
customer_reviews.text: so these are super cute.. but I needed them to hold more than 5 oz. this is good when u dont want to share alot of champagne.. but I would prefer bigger glasses. they seemed to be the same material as ones I've worked with before..just glittery.
customer_reviews.author: Mzgottajones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful champagne flutes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a bay shower. They are so nice and for the price can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: A little cheesy looking, but pretty good
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. You put them together so they’re a little cheesy looking but they do the job. I like the glitter in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Ready
customer_reviews.text: Since we had to change to an outdoor wedding due t COVID, we got all new cutlery, etc. These champagne flutes are perfect and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Quanita Tubman

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but many were cracked
customer_reviews.text: They were very pretty and worked great for the bridal shower I used them for. I did have 7 glasses cracked and they had to be thrown away. Before the event, make sure you check them so you have enough. Luckily, I didn’t need all of them but I would have been very unhappy if I did.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah J Herrin

customer_reviews.title: Many of the cups had arrived broken in the pack ...
customer_reviews.text: Many of the cups had arrived broken in the pack, because we were so close to the party I couldn't send it back and wait for a new shipment. Otherwise ok and as shows on the pictures. Some glass feet don't hold the cup and so you need to try on a few to match the top and bottom parts to have the full glass. Overall you get the quality you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Loeiza

customer_reviews.title: Cute glasses, but
customer_reviews.text: These champagne flutes were extremely cute. I ordered them for a bridal shower and they really added something to the event. However, the flute comes separate from the bottom, which wasn't initially a problem, but bottom started dropping off randomly. They did not screw in or twist on or anything of the such. You should almost glue the bottoms on because it was extremely annoying when your bottom would fall off and then you could not set down your glass.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Draheim

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking addition to our mimosa bar. They are plastic so if you squeeze them they will break. Also suggest that you dab a little glue to attach to the stem so they done fall off. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Nunzmom

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a birthday party. They came packaged very well. None were broken and they were properly sealed. They are cute and sturdy. Only had an issue with a couple of the bottoms not fitting properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jam84

customer_reviews.title: True to advertisement
customer_reviews.text: What I liked about it: they are a good size (not awkwardly short or anything), the sparkles aren't terribly tacky, you get 30 of them What I didn't like: the plastic feels REALLY cheap to me. It makes a terrible hollow sound when you put set it down whether it's full or empty. Perfect for an event like a bachelorette party, skip for a nice occasion
customer_reviews.author: Kalie Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great plastic drinkware! Easy to assemble and looks so pretty! Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tien

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Cranberry Mimosas on Thanksgiving
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a thanksgiving Day cocktail we were making. Super cute glasses and no dirty dishes to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Simpson Family

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive option
customer_reviews.text: Nice plastic option. They look almost like glass and are more sturdy than normal plastic flutes. Only issue is that the top part comes disconnected from the base easily, so I added glue dots when assembling them.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great value, nice product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a party and I was very pleased with them! They came packaged in a nice, sturdy box and they were easy and quick to assemble. The glitter wasn’t quite as sparkly as I had imagined but still somewhat noticeable. And the best part - I found the price to be very good compared to what I would have paid in a store! Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna W

customer_reviews.title: Worked Really Well!
customer_reviews.text: These were so cute and made the party look even fancier! Definitely get these!
customer_reviews.author: Sade V.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase a competitor set as well. That one came with already broken glasses. These ones made it through the entire party solid! Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fancy looking
customer_reviews.text: Even with the negative reviews ! I’m so happy I bought it! Really good quality! Gorgeous! Looks fancy! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit at our New Year's party! The flecks of gold really made them look nice for being plastic, and I didn't have to worry about our good glasses getting broken. They were really thick, too - we kept them all and will for sure be using them again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these glitter cups! They were easy to assemble and were great to have around the pool because no glass. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and packaging. Easy to put together and they looked very classy on display. Everyone thought they were glass until they picked them up. Gold sparkles were just enough.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: break easily
customer_reviews.text: even though these were plastic I had a whole row (5) break after they fell 2 feet (in the package with foam padding). since I dropped them it Is my own fault but I figured it would hold up a little better.... luckily I still had enough.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Brynjulson

customer_reviews.title: Cute but somewhat delicate
customer_reviews.text: These were super cute for a bridal shower. I set up a mimosa bar and these were awesome for that, the glitter is a nice touch. They are somewhat delicate though, be careful doing toasts because if you tap it against someone else's too hard they might crack.
customer_reviews.author: Lia Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very delicate
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and did the job! Lucky there were extras because you have to be very careful when attaching the bottom piece, they can crack easily but they did the job and worked great for wedding toast with my wedding party!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: A little thin (flew away fast in the wind) but very pretty and got the job done, I would definitely buy again. They were easy to assemble and packaged beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Nes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hit at a New Years party, just be careful if you have a Hulk like grip.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Best disposable glasses I've purchased.
customer_reviews.text: These were used for a bridal shower and made for a beautiful mimosa bar table. Came in a thick box and items were wrapped very securely. Nothing broken. Assemble quickly-a little hint...give the bottom a slight turn after it's attached to the stem. Would purchase again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wells

customer_reviews.title: Good set. 1 drawback.
customer_reviews.text: Decent set and did what we needed. One drawback. At least 10 of the 30 I received the stems wouldn’t stay seated in the base. With a couple drops of glue in the base it was an very easy fix. If we had waited until event time or close to event time to put these together we wouldn’t have had enough time for the glue to dry. I still recommend them but give yourself enough time and have some glue on hand in the event you experience the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Bear1411

customer_reviews.title: Made for a beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were used for an anniversary party. They came intact with no broken glasses. They were easy to put together. We received many compliments on how our tables looked. I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: deborah corritone

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit!!
customer_reviews.text: These goblets were a huge hit. I bought them for a party, and I was really worried they’d arrive broken. Not a single one was broken! The guests loved the glitter. I stressed that the glasses were fragile because of the reviews I read. The guests must have been careful because none of them broke or leaked. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Hockey Mom

customer_reviews.title: They look great and are easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: They look great and are easy to assemble. Unfortunately, none of them came with glitter and don't have time to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: kay97

customer_reviews.title: some broken some with the base that would fall off
customer_reviews.text: People kept loosing the bases so that while they were drinking the lower part would fall off. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Product was not checked by merchant before shippef
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality which was expected for the price. However 5 out of the 30 flutes were cracked when I opened box and took them out of wrapping. This was not from travel, cracked flutes came from manufacturer. Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Damaged items
customer_reviews.text: Broken champagne glasses when delivered we opened and most We’re damaged! Would like a refund
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they look so nice. Perfect for our New Years Eve party, so glad I found these. Great value for the price and they arrived very well pack.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Pizzolato

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and practical!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these drink flutes! Some of the bottoms came off but went right back on. Another reviewer complained of them being cracked so I tested each one with water. 30 for 30...they were perfect. Will use again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Walser

customer_reviews.title: Great value, very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging job. Very protected for shipping. Easy enough to assemble, you have to push hard enough to make sturdy but if you push too hard it will crack. Overall great value and they are very fancy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciated the craftsmanship, attention to detail in the packaging and shipping. Not one was broken or cracked and I really appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Tofumoma

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but fragile
customer_reviews.text: These plastic champagne flutes are very pretty but they’re a little fragile. I was very unhappy that several of them (16) were broken upon arrival. Maybe they need to be packed tighter in the box. In the picture are the broken ones. I was not happy.😞
customer_reviews.author: JerseyBroad

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase based on some of the previous reviews but went ahead and made the purchase for my upcoming wedding. The package arrived in top notch condition. They were boxed and bubble wrapped in each separate box and not a single glass broken. They are exactly what I wanted and couldn't have asked for something more simple yet elegant. We have put them together and are simply thrilled with the way they turned out! We definitely got our moneys worth considering how many you receive as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie Renae McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Product quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, so good and well organized in all details, colorful. Thanks a lot.Next year i will purchase it again if i need it for a party.
customer_reviews.author: SAMUEL PISANO

customer_reviews.title: Love them! But be careful
customer_reviews.text: Price for amount was good, they arrived on time, packaging solve the problem of breaking because they’re quite delicate. I rinsed them before using with a bit of soap and aired them to get rid of any plastic smell. They’re fragile so be careful of dropping, hitting, etc. Otherwise they’re super nice, great price for value and would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lucero Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty! Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my sister’s bachelorette party. They were perfect for champagne at night, mimosas in the morning. We had leftovers, and decided to pull them back out for Christmas and New Years. Really pretty! Totally happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Cheap garbage when you touch the flute it gets broken I got four pieces broken and the glitter look ugly
customer_reviews.author: George Daw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for special occasions!
customer_reviews.text: We’re using these for my grandparents 50th wedding anniversary. They’re so cute! The glitter does not rub off at all. Its engrained in the plastic in case anyone was wondering. I would of preferred the bottom be attached instead of having to stick the bottom on but other than that, they’re a great value for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Fer Patino

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste you money
customer_reviews.text: Omg i should listen to other reviews. 11 out of 30 are broken. Do not waste you money buying this. They are very flimsy. Very disappointed. I attached some pic
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Paczka

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Was a problem when I opened the box. One was broken. As we used them there were a few that had the bottoms fall off in the middle of a toast. But overall. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: SSmith1

customer_reviews.title: Champagne Wedding glasses fall apart easily
customer_reviews.text: The gold glitter Champagne wedding flutes were purchased for a wedding shower to have Mimosas. They come with the base and flute separate and are easily put together and look very attractive and festive but many of them unexpectantly fell apart and the base came off and the champagne spilled over onto the table and onto the clothing of the guests--not good.
customer_reviews.author: Bonna Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for celebrations
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something a little extra for our event. These were just that! They looked so nice and we had a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Renee

customer_reviews.title: Look great, high quality
customer_reviews.text: You do have to assemble these upon arrival but they look fantastic and are pretty solid and sturdy flutes. They were perfect and exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but flimsy. The bottoms kept falling off when we used them during the party. When we tried to push them on tighter, they broke easily. Got the job done, though.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good for NYE toast
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were very pretty and looked nice on the table for a NYE party. However, they aren’t that sturdy and we’re only good enough for 1 toast at midnight. The base of the the plastic glass is detachable to the stem and it’s not very secure but it worked for what I needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Cute cups, packaging was great
customer_reviews.text: Cute cups can't wait to use them for my party
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with these. I bought them for a brunch I was hosting. They did add a classy touch, but the plastic is flimsy and cloudy. In the pictures the plastic is clear, but not so much in person.
customer_reviews.author: Latte Diva

customer_reviews.title: They Get the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for celebrating! They looked slightly cheesier out of the box but if you’re not trying to impress forget the rest and go with these.
customer_reviews.author: Chalo6770

customer_reviews.title: Break very easily
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, I guess. Many of these broke as I was assembling them. Good for 1 time, disposable use. Plan to buy more than you need cause you will inevitably break some of them!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Drumm

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my best friends bridal shower and they were great. Easy to put together but, some of them wouldn't stay together. We used about 25 and 3 or so of those would not stay together. Overall, not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived extremely fast. Such a great deal for the money! Pretty sturdy and sparkly. Just want I needed for a baby shower I’m hosting!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Made the best party favors. But be super careful. They crack easily, just by twisting on the bottom to hard.
customer_reviews.author: Latosha Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great for your party!
customer_reviews.text: Elegant product for the price! Love the look and the quality! Be sure you assemble correctly to avoid accidents!
customer_reviews.author: SOL R.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These were very easy to put together and looked great. I used them for a bridal shower and they got the job done! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for New Year's Eve
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect touch for the champagne toast on New Year's Eve. Can be washed and reused.
customer_reviews.author: Teacherof7

customer_reviews.title: Excellent strong plastic flutes. Perfect for mimosa bar or toast
customer_reviews.text: Great fun flutes! Bought these for a mimosa bar and they were great! Very sturdy strong plastic. It was a great size for champange, juice and fruits. The gold glitter was a nice touch. They didnt feel cheap at all. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: I guess, You get what you pay for..?
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute, the perfect size and definitely low in price.. but the plastic is extremely thin. I ordered the 30 piece in gold glitter. They came in packages/sleeves of 5 stacked unassembled champagne flutes. But two of the packages I received are completely cracked, broken and not usable. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how sturdy these glasses were. I was going to use them for one time but they are so strong I can get a couple more uses out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my sister-in-law's bachelorette. They worked perfectly for morning mimosas. Several of the tops and bottoms were ill-fitting and others cracked, but these were a good value for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin K-Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome! Used for a 50th wedding anniversary. Then I hand washed them all and I plan to use them again for a bridal shower coming up! Great for the price! And pretty too!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty! We purchased these for NYE today and I love how easy it was to set up and store away. They are plastic, but no cheesy or cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: dominque1802

product_meta.title: Gold Glitter Plastic Classicware Glass Like Champagne Wedding Parties Toasting Flutes (1 Box = Quantity 30)
product_meta.description: If the occasion calls for champagne, then the occasion probably calls for plenty of champagne glasses. And, because creating a special occasion is really about creating a special mood, We are committed to offering high quality party essentials with an upscale look and feel at an affordable price.These 30 crystal clear 2-piece hard plastic champagne glasses have an elegant, timeless appeal. The glass and base fit together easily and snugly; their graceful shape showcases the delicate effervescence of sparkling champagne. So whether it's a wedding, simple neighborhood get together, holiday soiree or an easy clean-up romantic dinner for two. 2-piece hard plastic 5.5 ounce flutes have an elegant, timeless appeal. Each package contains 30 easy-to-assemble flutes. The base and glass fit together easily and snugly and the convenient 2-piece construction makes storage a breeze.
feature_bullets: Elegant classic silhouette; hand washable; reusable; disposable; easy clean-up
Each package contains 30 easy-to-assemble glasses; base and glass fit snugly; 2-piece construction makes after-party storage a breeze
Ideal for catering, food service, picnics, weddings, buffets, family reunions and everyday use
Not suitable for boiling hot liquids, dishwasher use, or microwave use, BPA FREE
Looking for Silver Glitter search: B077H4WR1X
